description: Rhonda Holy Bear uses her art to create cross-generational connections. This sculpture portrays a Lakota widow honoring her fallen husband by wearing his regalia. Her belt of honors showcases her own accomplishments as a woman, wife, and mother. The figure features 32 different Lakota artisitic techniques, such as beading and quillworking.
artist_info:
Rhonda Holy Bear
Wakah Wayuphika Win, Making with Exceptional Skills Woman (Cheyenne River Lakota, born 1959)
title: Lakota Honor - Sees The Horses Woman - SuWakan Ayutan Win
